messages.text: Hi, I'm looking for a 2BHK apartment in Dubai Marina
Great! We have several options available. What's your budget range?
Around 100-120k per year
Perfect! I have 3 properties that match your criteria
Can we schedule a site visit this weekend? Saturday morning would be ideal
What kind of laptops do you have available?
We have Dell, HP, Lenovo, and Apple laptops
I need something for gaming. What do you recommend?
For gaming, I'd suggest our ASUS ROG or MSI Gaming series
What are the specs of the ASUS ROG?
I saw your premium package is $199. That's quite expensive
I understand your concern. This package includes many premium features
Can you offer any discount? Maybe 20% off?
Let me check what I can do for you
If you can do $150, I'll sign up today
My internet connection keeps dropping every few minutes
I'm sorry to hear that. When did this issue start?
Started yesterday evening. I've already restarted the router
I see. Let me run a diagnostic on your connection
Please fix this urgently. I have important meetings today
Hi, I submitted a loan application last Monday
Hello! Let me check the status for you
It's been a week now. Any updates?
I can see your application is under review
When can I expect a decision? I'm following up as you asked me to
Do you have the iPhone 15 Pro in stock?
Yes, we have it in all colors except blue
Great! What's the price for the 256GB version?
The 256GB is $1099
Can I come to your store today to see it?
